Articles.Content:
Rovers:

Easy - manned: build a stock rover and deliver it either to the Mun or Duna.

Moderate - manned: build a stock rover with a minimum crew of 2 and deliver it to either Eve or Ike.

Hard - manned: build a VTOL stock rover with a minimum crew of 5 and deliver it either to Tylo or Dres, and get it back on orbit.

Extreme - manned: build an Mk3-sized rover with a minimum crew of 16 and all possible science experiments.

Easy - unmanned: build a stock rover, deliver it to the Mun, and recover back on orbit in any ways.

Moderate - unmanned: build a stock rover, deliver it to either Duna or Ike, and recover back on orbit using its own power.

Hard - unmanned: build a stock rover using an ISRU unit, a drill and all possible science experiments, deliver it to Duna, Dres or Tylo, and recover back on orbit using its own power.

Boats/Submarines:

Manned: build a stock boat with a minimum crew of 2 using any crewed command pod and deliver it on Laythe. 

Unmanned: build a stock submarine, deliver it on Laythe, and gather scientific data from the bottom of the ocean.

Rules:

-All entries should be self-sustainable and have at least 3 different types of scientific experiments.

-No save file editing in any way, and no using Debug Toolbar.

-All entries should have at least 3 different screenshots, and a used craft file.

-Mods that can be used in this challenge are: MechJeb, Kramax Autopilot, Trajectories, any visual mods (EVE, scatterer etc), Ven's Stock Part Revamp, assuming that the craft itself is only made of stock parts.

For the survivalist:

-Using a life support mod and have the crew with supplies for 30 days.

-Getting the craft back on Kerbin

-Using an SSTO to deliver the vehicle (for a mega pro)

Have fun!

 

 

Edited June 1, 2016 by awfulhumanbeing
